content.p: This sector covers a diverse range of occupations including airline pilot, merchant navy officer, rail operations manager, port manager and many others. Emily, Assistant Engineer at WSP, talks about her interest in transport planning and how she uses the skills developed during her degree in her job on a daily basis. If you have questions about your plans, talk to a member of our team. Click on each career below for links to publications and websites that provide further information on each career area. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
